title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A creamy Italian pasta dish that combines eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs and cheese.
In a pan, cook the pancetta until crispy.
Add the cooked spaghetti to the pan with pancetta.
Remove from heat and mix in the egg and cheese mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.
